author: lwang046
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a fix to the Hcal DQM issue in PR#29076 that is introduced by PR#29035 after change Hcal frame size from 8 to 10. The previous code was hardcoded for 8 TS case in run2. The change adjust the sample size automatically.
title: A fix to the TDC simulation for 10 TS in run3
